text: Regis Fernandes Silva (born 22 September 1976), also known by the nickname RegisLiga Americanense de Futebol, Regis Fernandes Silva, alcunha "Regis"; retrieved 2012-5-9. or Regis Pitbull, "ABC-RN contrata Régis Pitbull," Diário do Nordeste (Brazil). 18 May 2007; retrieved 2012-5-9. is a Brazilian professional athlete. He is best known as a football player.ZeroZero.pt, Régis Pitbull; retrieved 2012-5-9. ==Club career statistics== |- |2000||Kyoto Purple Sanga||J.
